page.title: 07BUS SURVEY
page.content: A bus survey was conducted using questionnaires in villages in the study area.{53%}of those questioned {used local buses}(67% at least weekly and 89% at least monthly). {RESULTS} Generally, fares are { cheap} 27% { expensive }73% Bus times are {convenient }68% { inconvenient }32% Bus services are {sufficient }50% { insufficient }50% Run at the {right times }60% { wrong times }40% The buses are { clean }52% {dirty }48% The buses are { reliable }95% {unreliable } 5% {CONCLUSION Buses are felt to be{reliable}but {expensive; >50%}of people feel that they are{convenient}and{clean.
